game.name: Silent Spirits
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Operate a secret speakeasy in 1920s America during Prohibition. Craft illicit alcohol, serve demanding customers, avoid police raids, smuggle shipments to the mob, and expand your empire across 15 years of escalating danger, pressure, and underground opportunity.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Operate a secret speakeasy in 1920s America during Prohibition. Craft illicit alcohol, serve demanding customers, avoid police raids, smuggle shipments to the mob, and expand your empire across 15 years of escalating danger, pressure, and underground opportunity.
